name: TwoDimensionalViewport
desc: A widget through which a portion of larger content can be viewed, typically in combination with a [TwoDimensionalScrollable].

fields.name: verticalOffset
fields.desc: Which part of the content inside the viewport should be visible in the vertical axis.

fields.name: verticalAxisDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which the [verticalOffset]'s [ViewportOffset.pixels] increases.

fields.name: horizontalOffset
fields.desc: Which part of the content inside the viewport should be visible in the horizontal axis.

fields.name: horizontalAxisDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which the [horizontalOffset]'s [ViewportOffset.pixels] increases.

fields.name: mainAxis
fields.desc: The main axis of the two.

fields.name: delegate
fields.desc: A delegate that provides the children for the [TwoDimensionalViewport].
